divs: Sighting DetailsFirst noticed this at sunrise. The shape appeared to be round and was translucent. Remained stationary for about 6 hours. Eventually the object dissappeared but I did not witness its departure. It may have been some sort of balloon but the fact that it remained in one position has me wondering. Attached is a photograph. Three other people with me saw this object.
Summary: Translucent sphere in sky stationary for 6 hours
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mountainair
There were no other sightings in Mountainair on or around February 28th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
